23  void SparePot::addServer(Server *s)
24  {
25  // stores the server
26  server_struct server;
27  server.s = dynamic_cast<SporadicServer *>(s);
28  server.wcet = s->getBudget();
29  server.period = s->getPeriod();
30 
31  server_vector.push_back(server);
32  }
33 
34  void SparePot::compute_matrix(Tick b, Tick p)
35  {
36  DBGENTER(_SPARE_POT_DBG_LEV);
37 
38  server_struct serv_s;
39  serv_s.s = 0;
40  serv_s.period = p;
41  serv_s.wcet = b;
42 
43  server_vector.push_back(serv_s);
44 
45  // computes the m_i,j, then calls addServer(s, m)
46  // first sort by increasing period (rate monotonic)
47  DBGPRINT("Sorting the vector of size " << server_vector.size());
48 
49  sort(server_vector.begin(), server_vector.end());
50 
51  DBGPRINT("Now the vector is sorted, compute response times");
52  // then compute response times
53  vector<double> response_time(server_vector.size());
54  response_time[0] = server_vector[0].wcet;
55 
56  DBGVAR(response_time[0]);
57 
58  for (int i=1; i<server_vector.size(); i++) {
59  DBGVAR(i);
60  double rtime = server_vector[i].wcet;
61  double old_rtime = 0;
62  while (old_rtime != rtime) {
63  old_rtime = rtime;
64  rtime = server_vector[i].wcet;
65  for (int j=0; j<i; j++)
66  rtime += ceil(old_rtime / (double)server_vector[j].period) * (double)server_vector[j].wcet;
67 
68  if (rtime > (double)server_vector[i].period) {
69  cerr << "Response time greater than period" << endl;
70  exit(-1);
71  }
72  DBGVAR(rtime);
73  }
74  response_time[i] = rtime;
75  DBGVAR(response_time[i]);
76  }
77 
78  DBGPRINT("Now computing the eta");
79 
80  // now compute the eta_i,j (with j < i)
81  vector< vector<double> > eta;
82  for (int i=0; i<server_vector.size(); i++) {
83  vector<double> myeta_i;
84  DBGPRINT("For task i= " << i);
85  for (int j=0; j<i; j++) {
86  double e = ceil(response_time[i]/(double)server_vector[j].period);
87  myeta_i.push_back(e);
88  DBGVAR(e);
89  }
90  eta.push_back(myeta_i);
91  }
92 
93  setSpare(b, p);
94 
95  DBGPRINT("Now computing the m_i,i");
96 
97  // now compute the m_i,j and add the server to the algorithm
98  for (int i=1; i<server_vector.size(); i++) {
99  DBGVAR(i);
100  row_t m;
101  for (int j=0; j<i; j++) {
102  DBGPRINT("eta["<< i << "][" << j << "]: " << eta[i][j]);
103  double rate = eta[i][j];
104  DBGVAR(rate);
105  for (int h=i+1; h<server_vector.size(); h++) {
106  rate = min(rate, eta[h][j]/eta[h][i]);
107  DBGVAR(eta[h][j]/eta[h][i]);
108  DBGVAR(rate);
109  }
110  m.push_back(rate);
111  }
112  DBGVAR(m.size());
113  addMyServer(server_vector[i].s, m);
114  }
115  }
116 
117 
118  void SparePot::addMyServer(SporadicServer *s, const row_t &m)
119  {
120  servers[s] = counter;
121  counter ++;
122 
123  row_t myrow;
124  for (int i=0; i<counter; i++) myrow.push_back(m[i]);
125 
126  coeff.push_back(myrow);
127  delta.push_back(0);
128 
129  //row_t myrow(counter);
130  for(int i=0; i<counter; i++) myrow[i] = 0;
131 
132  pi.push_back(myrow);
133 
134  for (int i=0; i<counter-1; i++) {
135  pi[i].push_back(0);
136  }
137  }
138 
139  void SparePot::setSpare(const Tick &budget, const Tick &period)
140  {
141  if (counter != 0)
142  throw SparePotExc("setSpare() must be called first!");
143 
144  servers[0] = 0;
145  counter++;
146 
147  spare_budget = budget;
148 
149  row_t myrow;
150  coeff.push_back(myrow);
151  delta.push_back(budget);
152 
153  myrow.push_back(-budget);
154  pi.push_back(myrow);
155  }
156 
157 
158  Tick SparePot::changeBudget(Server *ss, Tick db)
159  {
160  DBGENTER(_SPARE_POT_DBG_LEV);
161 
162  SporadicServer *s = (SporadicServer *) ss;
163 
164  int index = servers[s];
165  double ret = 0;
166  double delta_budget = double(db);
167 
168  DBGVAR(index);
169  DBGVAR(delta_budget);
170 
171  if (delta_budget > 0) {
172  DBGPRINT("Positive part");
173  for (int j=index; j>=0 && delta_budget>0; j--) {
174  if (delta[j] > 0) {
175  DBGVAR(coeff[index][j]);
176  double x = min(delta_budget, coeff[index][j]*delta[j]);
177  pi[index][j] = pi[index][j] + x;
178  pi[j][index] = pi[j][index] + x/coeff[index][j];
179 
180  delta[index] = delta[index] - x;
181  delta[j] = delta[j] - x/coeff[index][j];
182 
183  delta_budget = delta_budget - x;
184  ret = ret + x;
185 
186  DBGPRINT_4("j=", j, " x = ", x);
187  DBGPRINT_4("pi[index][j] = ", pi[index][j],
188  " pi[j][index] = ", pi[j][index]);
189  DBGPRINT_4("delta[index] = ", delta[index],
190  " delta[j] = ", delta[j]);
191  DBGPRINT_2("delta_budget = ", delta_budget);
192 
193  }
194  }
195  }
196  else if (delta_budget < 0) {
197  DBGPRINT("Negative part");
198  for (int j=0; j<index && delta_budget < 0; j++) {
199  double x = min(pi[index][j], -delta_budget);
200  pi[index][j] = pi[index][j] - x;
201  pi[j][index] = pi[j][index] - x/coeff[index][j];
202 
203  delta[index] = delta[index] + x;
204  delta[j] = delta[j] + x/coeff[index][j];
205 
206  delta_budget = delta_budget + x;
207  ret = ret - x;
208 
209  DBGPRINT_4("j=", j, " x = ", x);
210  DBGPRINT_4("pi[index][j] = ", pi[index][j],
211  " pi[j][index] = ", pi[j][index]);
212  DBGPRINT_4("delta[index] = ", delta[index],
213  " delta[j] = ", delta[j]);
214  DBGPRINT_2("delta_budget = ", delta_budget);
215 
216  }
217  if (delta_budget < 0) {
218  DBGPRINT_2("delta_budget is still ", delta_budget);
219  DBGVAR(delta[index]);
220 
221  pi[index][index] = pi[index][index] + delta_budget;
222 
223  //assert(delta[index] == 0);
224 
225  delta[index] = delta[index] - delta_budget;
226 
227  DBGPRINT_2("delta[index] = ", delta[index]);
228  DBGPRINT_2("pi[index][index] = ", pi[index][index]);
229 
230  ret = ret + delta_budget;
231  }
232  }
233 
234  DBGVAR(last_change_time);
235  if (last_change_time <= SIMUL.getTime()) {
236  last_change_time = s->changeBudget(Tick::ceil(ret)+s->getBudget());
237  DBGPRINT_2("in the past, new change time at ", last_change_time);
238  }
239  else {
240  DBGPRINT("in the future");
241  if (ret < 0) {
242  last_change_time = max(last_change_time,
243  s->changeBudget(Tick::ceil(ret)+s->getBudget()));
244  DBGPRINT_2("ret < 0, new change time at ", last_change_time);
245  }
246  else if (ret > 0) {
247  ChangeBudgetEvt *e = new ChangeBudgetEvt(this, s, Tick::ceil(ret)+s->getBudget());
248  e->post(last_change_time, true);
249  DBGPRINT_2("ret > 0, new change time at ", last_change_time);
250  }
251  }
252 
253  return Tick::floor(ret);
254  }
255 
256  void SparePot::onChangeBudget(ChangeBudgetEvt *e)
257  {
258  DBGENTER(_SPARE_POT_DBG_LEV);
259  SporadicServer *ss = e->getServer();
260  ss->changeBudget(Tick::floor(e->getBudget()));
261  }
262 
263  void SparePot::newRun()
264  {
265  DBGENTER(_SPARE_POT_DBG_LEV);
266  last_change_time = 0;
267 
268  DBGVAR(delta.size());
269  delta[0] = spare_budget;
270 
271  DBGVAR(pi.size());
272  pi[0][0] = -spare_budget;
273 
274  for (int j=1; j<counter; j++) pi[0][j] = 0;
275 
276  for (int i=1; i<counter; i++) {
277  delta[i] = 0;
278  for (int j=0; j<counter; j++) pi[i][j] = 0;
279  }
280  }
281 
282  void SparePot::endRun()
283  {
284  }
